review: I had bone dislocation issue so went to hospital. ****** *** **** ** ********** *** I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. X-ray was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. I am good now. I had finger bone issue. Painkillers were recommended by the doctor. Doctor was friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have no words to respect this doctor who saved my life. Its almost 6 years back. I still feel afraid remembering about the situation. I had been to this hospital after a terrible shoulder dislocation and as an emergency case. This doctor saved my life by  setting back my shoulder to normal without pain. I cannot forget his kindness for my lifetime.

Not at all recommend this doctor to anyone.not professional every time you have to wait and he will not explain the situation. * **** ********* ***** ***** ******* *** **** ********* ******* *** *** *********** **** ****** ** *** *******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had been for spinal therapy. Was not satisfied with the treatment and the proper problem explanation was not given.

My mother had chronic pain in her knee and Dr Jatti was recommended from one of my friend . We reached out to him and i would say , we did the right decision. He is very experienced in handling senior citizens , explained all aspects very clearly and called out the nuances.  The operation went well , we did not have any issues during any of the process , it was well planned . Expectations were set and he did articulate the effort my mother has to put if she wants to fully recover. Also recommended a physician .
Give him a 10/10 rating . One of the best doctors

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Listens problem patiently. Experienced. Simple treatment. Diagnosed the problem easily. Everyone can consult.

Excellent work and very neatly explained the issues, like the doctor work 5star to him, 
The only negative  part is the place where the Apollo spectra are only into minting in the name of doctor and which might impact doctor  name
****** ** ***** *** don't recommend the hospital. Staff was not empathetic and mechanical. Receptionist treats you like a number and not as a guest paying big money
